text:
RELIGION

Ramayanam: Navalpakkam Narasimhan, Visranthi Old Age Home, M.G.R. Rd., Palavakkam, 3-30 p.m.; M.A. Venkatakrishnan, Asthika Samajam, Venus Colony, Alwarpet, 6-30 p.m.; R.Krishnamurthy, Sri Sankara Gurukulam, 8/20, C.P. Ramaswamy St., Abhiramapuram, 6-45 p.m.

Mahabharatham: Rama Dikshithar, Sri Krishna Gana Sabha, T. Nagar, 6-30 p.m.

Bhagavatham: Paramasukhananda, Ramakrishna Math, Mylapore, 5-30 p.m.

Gita: Ramana Swaroopananda, R-Block, 47/15, 15th St., Anna Nagar, 6-45 p.m.

Upanishad Saaram: Jamadhagni, Vyasa Mandali, 38, 3rd St., V.V. Colony, Adambakkam, 7 p.m.

Jeevanmukti Vivekam: K.S. Maheswaran, Sri Sankara Gurukulam, 8/20, C.P. Ramaswamy St., Abhiramapuram, 5 p.m.

Ramanuza 108: Venu Raza Narayanan, Sri Santhana Venugopala Perumal Temple, Pedariyar Koil St., Broadway, 6 p.m.

Malukandavasiriyar Varthai: Oragadam Lakshminarasimhachari, Sri Lakshmi Narasimhaswami Temple, Ponvilandha Kalathur, Chengalpet, 6-30 p.m.

Vedanta Treatise: R. Aravindan, C Flat, Harmony, 20/39, Venkatarathinam Nagar, Adyar, 6-45 p.m.

CULTURE

Organising Committee: Inauguration of ‘Ikebana exhibition’, First Lady of the Consulate General of Japan in Chennai Atsuko Baba participates, Bhavani Mansion, 4th Lane, Nungambakkam High Rd., 10-30 a.m.

National Jute Board: Inauguration of Jute fair, Annai Teresa Mahalir Complex, Valluvarkottam, 3-30 p.m.

Organising Committee: Inauguration of painting exhibition, Hotel Ambassador Pallava, 5-30 p.m.

GENERAL

Quaid-E-Milleth Government College for Women: Graduation day, Governor K. Rosaiah participates, Anna Salai, 11 a.m.

The Fisheries Technocrats Forum: Workshop on ‘Marketing strategies for newly cultured fishes in India’, CIBA, 75, Santhome High Rd., R.A. Puram, 9-30 a.m.

VIT University: Inauguration of workshop on ‘Innovation and Social Entrepreneurship’, Vandalur – Kelambakkam Rd., 9-30 a.m.

Dr. M.G.R. Educational and Research Institute University: Inauguration of conference ‘Silicon ‘16’, Maduravoyal, 10 a.m.

Valliammai Engineering College: Lectures on ‘Queuing Theory and its Applications,’ 8.45 a.m. and ‘Engineering Materials,’ Kattankulathur, 2.45 p.m.

S.A. Engineering College: Inauguration of Rotaract Club, 9 a.m., Lecture on ‘Measurements and Instrumentation’, Thiruverkadu, 10.30 a.m.

Citizen Consumer and civic action Group and FEDCOT: Workshop on ‘Internet and Safety’, Hotel Raj Palace Sundar, 10 a.m.
title: Chennai today
